text:
COMMANDS & MEANINGS FOR CREATING MAGIC 

 caeser : each letter in the plaintext is replaced by a letter some fixed number of positions down the alphabet. Try it by typing `caeser [fixed number for shift]`

CAESER SHIFT 


 The following sample text will be initialized in sacred text: 

 <-------------------------------------->

  Magical systems combine practical exercises for bringing about change with beliefs, attitudes, a conceptual model of the universe.
